Package cz.vutbr.fit.gja.models.exam

Class ExamController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.vutbr.fit.gja.models.exam.ExamController
  • @Controller
public class ExamController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates all methods that handle incoming exam requests and send responses

      • root

        @GetMapping("/")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView root()
        Get for root returns model and view of exams
        Returns:
        view pages/logged/exams with model if user is logged view pages/exams with model if user is not logged

      • getExams

        @GetMapping("/exams")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getExams​(@RequestParam(required=false,name="login")
                                                             java.lang.String login)
        Shows all students exams for normal user
        Parameters:
        login - Login of the searched student
        Returns:
        /exams page with all students exams

      • getExamsAsLogged

        @GetMapping("/logged/exams")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getExamsAsLogged()
        Shows all exams created by logged user
        Returns:
        /login/exams page with all exams created by logged user
